'''The King of the Mountain and the Vale''' was the ruler of the sovereign [[Kingdom of the Mountain and the Vale]] from the [[Andal]] [[Andal Invasion|invasion]] of [[Westeros]] until the [[War of Conquest]]. The first King of the Mountain and the Vale was Ser [[Artys Arryn]], who defeated the last [[Mountain King]] and founded [[House Arryn]], a dynasty that ruled the kingdom until [[Aegon I Targaryen|Aegon the Conqueror]]'s invasion of Westeros. The boy-king [[Ronnel Arryn (King)|Ronnel Arryn]] peacefully submitted his kingdom to Aegon in return for a ride on [[Visenya Targaryen]]'s dragon [[Vhagar]].
